Deutsch: the complete Manchu and Chinese banquet
English: the Manchu Han imperial feast, a legendary banquet in the Qing dynasty

d.f: `清~`代~`宮廷~`最~`隆重~`的~`公~`宴~。`通常~`在~`皇帝~`大~`婚~，`公主~`下嫁~，`或~`皇帝~，`太上皇~，`皇太后~`生辰~`時~`舉行~，`山珍海味~，`無不~`具備~。`後~`泛~`稱~`有~`燒烤~`的~`酒席~。

Deutsch: the complete Manchu and Chinese banquet
English: the Manchu Han imperial feast, a legendary banquet in the Qing dynasty
